title: Drawing, "Studies of Mallow", early 20th century
medium: Brush and watercolor on white paper
inscribed: recto: S. L. Crownfield (inscribed by her sister, Gertrude) / No. 7
creditline: Gift of Starling W. Childs and Ward Cheney
description: Vertical sheet depicting three sprays of pink mallow.

Drawing, "Studies of Mallow", early 20th century.
